content: you must know basic stitches chain half_double_crochet stitch slip_stitch i used cotton yarn but you can use any kind of yarn you want make sure you use the same weight yarn or very close to one i used check mt and weight scarf-bib worked side to side making decreases to shape triangle and hat worked flat then joined together in this pattern you work your half_double_crochet and slip stitches only in the back loops of your work this pattern comes in 4 sizes 1year- 2year- 3year- 4year old pattern made with - alize bella 100% cotton 100g 360meters color 7649 2 5mm crochet hook 1 button gauge 33hdc x 28rows / 10x10cm square used 1 5 skeins for 2year old size © knitwear by lina all rights reserved the pattern is only sold for private use sale of the pattern and the finished products made from the pattern is strictly forbidden likewise it is also not legal to reproduce either the pattern or the finished product in whole or in parts without the permission of knitwear by lina by purchasing downloading or printing this pattern you have accepted these terms and conditions
